B

the index where the color of the background is located
BALL_COLOR_INDEX - Static variable in class Pong
the index where the color of the ball is located

C

createWinnerLabel(String) - Static method in class Pong
clears the game panel of all other labels and creates a label with the winners name

D

the index where the x speed of the ball is located
DELTAY_INDEX - Static variable in class Pong
the index where the y speed of the ball is located

F

the height of the entire screen
FRAME_WIDTH - Static variable in class Pong

G

the height of the actual game
GAME_PANEL_WIDTH - Static variable in class Pong

getBallColor() - Static method in class Pong
gets the color value of the ball
getColor(String) - Static method in class Pong
gets the color value based on the name of a color
getDeltaX() - Static method in class Pong
gets the integer value of the x speed of the ball
getDeltaY() - Static method in class Pong
gets the integer value of the y speed of the ball
getGameBackgroundColor() - Static method in class Pong
gets the color value of the background
getPaddleColor() - Static method in class Pong
gets the color value of the paddles
getPlayer1Name() - Static method in class Pong
gets player1 name from the settings as a string
getPlayer2Name() - Static method in class Pong
gets player2 name from the settings as a string
getPointsToWin() - Static method in class Pong
gets the integer value of the needed points to win
getScoreFont() - Static method in class Pong
gets the font file and returns it to be used

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Pong
creates the GUI for the game and starts the game from gamepanel

P

PADDLE_COLOR_INDEX - Static variable in class Pong
the index where the color of the paddles is located
PLAYER1_NAME_INDEX - Static variable in class Pong
the index where the player1 name is located
PLAYER2_NAME_INDEX - Static variable in class Pong
the index where the player2 name is located
POINTS_TO_WIN_INDEX - Static variable in class Pong
the index where the number of points needed to win is located
Pong - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a game that stimulates table tennis two players each control a paddle on the left or right a person scores when the ball reaches one of the borders the points to win can be changed in the settings
Pong() - Constructor for class Pong
 

S

SCORE_SIZE - Static variable in class Pong
the font size for the score
SPACE_WIDTH - Static variable in class Pong
the width of the space between the two players labels

U

updateScores(Integer, Integer) - Static method in class Pong
updates the scores that are displayed
